lead_paragraph: The abrupt move came as Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu publicly conducted negotiations with a far-right party to join his government.

byline.original: By JAMES GLANZ and IRIT PAZNER GARSHOWITZ

headline.print_headline: Israeli Defense Minister Resigns, Saying He’s ‘Fearful’ for Country’s Future
headline.main: Moshe Yaalon, Israeli Defense Minister, Resigns

snippet: The abrupt move came as Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu publicly conducted negotiations with a far-right party to join his government.
abstract: Israeli Defense Min Moshe Yaalon abruptly quits post, amid Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu's attempts to broaden conservative Likud Party's influence by shuffling cabinet positions; says Netanyahu's offer of position to ultranationalist Avigdor Lieberman has damaged his faith in Netanyahu and direction of country.
